data.title: 准备以至少20秒的时间回答以下问题
data.answer: I would like to introduce to you a famous historical figure from China. His name is He Zheng. He was the captain of the Silk Roads' fleet in ancient China. He is very famous in China because he had brought prosperity to all neighboring countries along the Silk Roads. At the same time, his forecasting eyesight of trad had exchanged foreign goods to ancient China. So ancient Chinese could have the opportunity to consume a variety of goods from overseas. The concept of the Silk Roads now is used for modern trading. Now, China keeps using the same concept to help neighbors to develop the economy. I really admire him because I also want to contribute to my home country.
data.referenceText: Describe a famous historical figure from your home country, what are they known for? Do you admire them? Why are why not?
data.referenceTranslate: 描述一个来自你的国家的著名历史人物，他们以什么闻名?
